original_text:
The tents of marauders are undisturbed,
    and those who provoke God are secure—
    those God has in his hand.
korean_text: 강도의 장막은 형통하고 하나님을 진노하게 하는 자는 평안하니 하나님이 그의 손에 후히 주심이니라

sentences.original_text: The tents of marauders are undisturbed
and those who provoke God are secure
those God has in his hand
